mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY (INQUIRY_NO, USER_NO, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_CONTENT, INQUIRY_DATE, INQUIRY_RESPONSE) VALUES (SEQ_INQUIRY_NO.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryContent}, SYSDATE, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT INQUIRY_NO, USER_NO, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_CONTENT, INQUIRY_DATE, INQUIRY_RESPONSE FROM INQUIRY
SELECT I.*, U.USER_ID FROM INQUIRY I JOIN USER_INFO U ON (I.USER_NO = U.USER_NO)
SELECT I.*, U.USER_ID FROM INQUIRY I JOIN USER_INFO U ON (I.USER_NO = U.USER_NO) WHERE U.USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{userId} || '%'
